build.beforeDevCommand: sh -c 'if [ -d ./ui ]; then pnpm --dir ./ui dev; else pnpm --dir ../ui dev; fi'
build.beforeBuildCommand: sh -c 'if [ -d ./ui ]; then pnpm --dir ./ui build; else pnpm --dir ../ui build; fi'

security.csp: default-src 'self'; img-src 'self' data: asset: https:; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; script-src 'self'; connect-src 'self' https://api.github.com https://github.com;
